channel.title: Projects on Alistair Keggen
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alistair Keggen

item.title: Project 1: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Alistair Keggen Project 1 When I was looking at the various datasets available to me, I was very curious to see if there was a correlation between how much a country drinks and how high its Human Freedom Index Score was. Could there be an interesting correlation between alcohol consumption and having a lower personal freedom score? Alcohol is known to cause dangerous situations, so I wanted to see if higher alcohol consumption does lower the score of each country.

item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: Alistair Keggen Project 2 library(dplyr) library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE) # Suppress summarise info options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE) storms <- storms storms ## # A tibble: 10,010 x 13 ## name year month day hour lat long status category wind pressure ts_diameter hu_diameter ## <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <int> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <ord> <int> <int> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 Amy 1975 6 27 0 27.5 -79 tropic~ -1 25 1013 NA NA ## 2 Amy 1975 6 27 6 28.
